member.name: T:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList
member.summary: A set of conditions and types that have have conjunctions (i.e. "and", "or") and executors (i.e. Types(), GetResult()) applied to them.

member.name: F:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList._types
member.summary: A list of types that conditions can be applied to.

member.name: F:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList._sequence
member.summary: The sequence of conditions that is applied to the type of list.

member.name: F:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList._should
member.summary: Determines the polarity of the selection, i.e. "should" or "should not".

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList.GetResult
member.summary: Returns an indication of whether all the selected types satisfy the conditions.
member.returns: An indication of whether the conditions are true.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of types that satisfy the conditions.
member.returns: A list of types.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList.GetTypes
member.summary: Returns the list of types that satisfy the conditions.
member.returns: A list of types.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList.And
member.summary: Specifies that any subsequent condition should be treated as an "and" condition.
member.returns: An set of conditions that can be applied to a list of classes.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.ConditionList.Or
member.summary: Specifies that any subsequent conditions should be treated as part of an "or" condition.
member.returns: An set of conditions that can be applied to a list of classes.

member.summary: Creates a list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.summary: The list of types represented by this instance.

member.name: F:NetArchTest.Rules.Types._exclusionList
member.summary: The list of namespaces to exclude from the current domain.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Mono.Cecil.TypeDefinition})
member.summary: Prevents any external class initializing a new instance of the class.
member.param: The list of types for the instance.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.InCurrentDomain
member.summary: Creates a list of types based on all the assemblies in the current AppDomain
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.InAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Creates a list of types based on a particular assembly.
member.param: The assembly to base the list on.
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.InAssemblies(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Creates a list of types based on a list of assemblies.
member.param: The assemblies to base the list on.
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.InNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a list of all the types in a particular namespace.
member.param: The namespace to list types for. This is case insensitive.
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.FromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a list of all the types in a particular module file.
member.param: The filename of the module. This is case insensitive.
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.
member.remarks: Assumes that the module is in the same directory as the executing assembly.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.FromPath(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a list of all the types found on a particular path.
member.param: The relative path to load types from.
member.returns: A list of types that can have predicates and conditions applied to it.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.GetAllTypes(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Mono.Cecil.TypeDefinition})
member.summary: Recursively fetch all the nested types in a collection of types.
member.returns: The expanded collection of types

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.GetTypeDefinitions
member.summary: Returns the list of objects describing the types in this list.
member.returns: The list of objects in this list.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.GetTypes
member.summary: Returns the list of objects describing the types in this list.
member.returns: The list of objects in this list.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.That
member.summary: Allows a list of types to be applied to one or more filters.
member.returns: A list of types onto which you can apply a series of filters.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.Should
member.summary: Applies a set of conditions to the list of types.

member.name: M:NetArchTest.Rules.Types.ShouldNot
member.summary: Applies a negative set of conditions to the list of types.
